t: J & J Snack Foods Products
s: J & J Snack Foods got its start when Gerald E. Shreiber purchased the J & J Pretzel Company in 1971 in Pennsauken, NJ. At the time, the company had only 8 employees and $400,000 in annual sales. By 2017, company sales had reached 1 billion dollars.
